text: Richard J. Joseph is the 36th and currently serving Chief Scientist of the United States Air Force who has been in the role since February 2018. == Education == Richard J. Joseph has a Bachelors of Science in Physics from Georgetown University in Washington D.C, and a Ph.D in Physics, from University of Texas, Austin. == References == Category:Chief Scientists of the United States Air Force Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Georgetown University alumni Category:University of Texas alumni
title: Richard J. Joseph
